casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Haymond, Appellant, v. Cincinnati Public Schools; Conrad, Admr., et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Haymond v. Cincinnati Pub. Schools (2000), 90 Ohio St.3d 70.]

(No. 00-43 Submitted July 25, 2000 Decided September 20, 2000.) Butkovich, Schimpf, Schimpf & Ginocchio Co., L.P.A., James A. Whittaker and Stephen P. Gast, for appellant. *71Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William D. Haders, Assistant Attorney General, for appellees Administrator, Bureau of Workers’ Compensation, and Industrial Commission of Ohio.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
